car
Class Vehicle

java.lang.Object
  car.Vehicle
All Implemented Interfaces:
IVehicle, IObservable, IEventTarget<VehicleEvent>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Car
public abstract class Vehicle
extends java.lang.Object
implements IVehicle

The abstract vehicle This class contains all the needed information and methods for a vehicle.

Field Summary
protected  float acceleration
          The current acceleration This acceleration is added to the speed and/or direction
protected  VehicleDimension dimension
          The vehicle's dimension
protected  IVector direction
          The direction the vehicle is heading This vector has always the length 1 (unit vector)
protected  float drivenLaneDistance
          The driven distance on the lane
protected  IDriverView driverView
          The driver's view
protected  boolean freezed
          Indicate that the vehicle has crashed
protected  java.util.Queue<ILane> lanes
          The lane the vehicle is on
protected  IVector lastPosition
          The last direction
protected  IVector position
          The position in the simulation of the vehicle
static int queueSize
           
protected  float speed
          The current speed of the vehicle
protected  IMovable wayPoint
          The way point that belongs to this vehicle
